item.description:
Who doesn't love St. Patty's Day - any excuse to drink is a good one, riiiiiiiiiiight?

I'll be getting there around 5:30 but you can get there whenever you want! There's no designated meeting area - I'll prolly just stake out whatever available space there is for our group.

Ri Ra is having Irish dancers and bagpipers scheduled to perform at 6 though, so if you want to see that, I suggest getting there before that time.
item.how_to_find_us: memorize my photo, message me for my cell, OR just look for the Asian dwarf
item.name: St. Patty's Day @ Ri Ra
